duties_responsibilities.duty: Subcontractor outreach to obtain all necessary documentation required for prequalification process.
Thorough understanding of COMPASS Prequalification Software.
Maintenance of Business Unit Master Bidders List.
Confirmation of current prequalification status of potential bidders.
Communication of prequalification status to Purchasing on a consistent basis.
Assist in the collection and preparation of required documents.

education_certification.credential: Associates Degree or 3 years of equivalent combination of education and experience.
Some construction industry experience or internship preferred.
